verses.content: Rakil chun Jakob chu nau hrim a neipêk nawh ti ân hriet chun, a unu chu a îtthîk tah a, Jakob kuoma chun, “Nauhai mi pe rawh, chuong naw chun ka thi el ding a nih,” a tih a.
Rakil chunga chun Jakob chu a lunginsen thut el a; chuongchun, “I rîla ra phalnawtu Pathien aiawtu bêk am ka nih?” a tih a.
Amanu chun, “En ta, ka suoknu Bilha hi, ama hi pâwl rawh; chuong- chun, kei khâwmin amaah nauhai ka nei ve theina dingin, ka khûp chunga hin nau a nei ding annâwm,” a tih a.
Chuongchun, a suoknu Bilha chu a nuhmei dingin a pêk a, Jakob chun ama chu a lo pâwl a.
Bilha chu ân rai a, Jakob chu naupasal a neipêk tah a.
Rakil chun, “Pathienin a mi ngaituoh a, ka rawl a hriet bawk a, naupasal a mi pêk a ni hi,” a tih a. Chuleiin, a hmingah Dan a sak a.
Chun, Rakil suoknu Bilha chu ân rai nâwk a, Jakob chu naupasal dang a neipêk nâwk a.
Chun, Rakil chun, “Pathien in- buonin ka unaunu chu ka buon a, ka hne tah,” a tih a, chuongchun, a hmingah Naphtali a sak a.
Leah chun nau dang a nei nâwk ta nawh ti ân hrietin a suoknu Zilpah chu a ṭhuoi a, a nuhmei dingin Jakob kuomah a pêk a.
Chuongchun, Leah suoknu Zil- pah chun Jakob chu naupasal a neipêk a.
Chun, Leah chun, “A va ham- ṭhatthlâk ngei de,” a tih a; chuong- chun, a hmingah Gad a sak a.
Leah suoknu Zilpah chun Jakob chu naupasal dang a neipêk nâwk a.
Leah chun, “Ka va hamṭha de! nuhmeihai chun hamṭha mi ti ngawt an tih,” a tih a; chuongchun, a hming- ah Aser a sak a.
Chun, bu lâk lai hin Reuben chun phûlah Zâwldiai a va hmuh a, a nu Leah kuomah a hung chawi a. Chun, Rakil chun Leah kuomah, “Lunginsiettakin i naupa zâwldiai a ṭhen mi pe ta?” a tih a.

Ama ruok chun, “Ka pasal i mi lâkpêk hi thil duoi am a nih? Ka naupa zawldiai khawm i mi lâkpêk nâwk pei ding maw?” a tih a. Rakil chun, “Annawleh, i naupa zâwldiai aiah vawizân zâlpui a ti che,” a tih a.

Chun, zântieng chun Jakob chu phûla inthawk chun a hung a, Leah chu a tuok dingin a va suok a, “I mi pâwl ding a nih, ka naupa zawldiaiin ka haw tlat ta che a nih,” a tih a. Chuongchun, chu zân chun a zâlpui tah a.
Chun, Pathienin Leah ṭawng- ṭaina a ngai a; chuongchun, ân rai a, Jakob chu naupasal pangana a neipêk a.
Leah chun, “Ka suoknu chu ka pasal kuoma ka pêk leiin Pathienin ka hlaw a mi pêk tah a ni hi,” a tih a: chuongchun, a hmingah Issakar a sak a.
Chun, Leah chu ân rai nâwk a, Jakob chu naupasal parukna a neipêk a.
Chun, Leah chun, “Pathienin thuom ṭhatak a mîn neitir a; tuhin chu ka pasal chu naupasal paruk ka neipêk ta leiin ka kuomah um tâng a tih,” a tih a; chuongchun, a hmingah Zebulun a sak a.
Chu hnunga chun naunuhmei a nei a, a hmingah Dina a sak a.
Chun, Pathienin Rakil chu a hriet zing a, Pathien chun a ṭawng- ṭaina a ngai a, a sul a hawngpêk tah a.
Chuongchun, ân rai a, naupasal a nei a: chun, “Pathienin ka hming sie ân khum tah,” a tih a:
chun, “Lalpa chun naupasal dang mi pe sa raw se,” tiin, a hmingah Josef a sak a.

Rakilin Josef a hung nei chun, Jakobin Laban kuomah, “Ka umna pângngai, ka ram tienga ka fe theina dingin mîn fetir ta raw khai, i rawng ka bâwl san ka nuhmeihai le ka nauhai hi mi pe la, mîn fetir rawh.
I rawng ka bâwlpêk zie che hlak chu i hriet sih a,” a tih a.
Laban chun a kuomah, “I mi lunginsiet thei chun la um phawt ta la, LALPA chun nanga zârah mal a mi sâwm ti aisânin ka hriet i sawnnaw,” a tih a.
Chun, ama bawkin, “I hlaw ding chu mi hril la, chuongchun, pêng ka ti che,” a tih a.
Ama chun, “Iengtin am i rawng ka bâwl a, ka enkawlna hnuoiah i ran chu iengtin am an um ti i hriet annâwm.

Ka hung hma chun tlâwmte bak i nei a, tuhin chu tamtak an hung ni ta hi; ka nghatna tieng tieng LALPA chun mal a sâwmpêk pei che a nih: amiruokchu, iengtik am keia sûngkaw ta dingin suksuok vêng ka tih a?” a tih a.
Chun, ama chun, “Ieng am pêng ka ti cheh a” a tih a. Jakob chun, “Iengkhawm i mi pêk ding a ni nawh; hi thil hi i mi thawpêk chun i ran ruol chu inthlain vêngpêk nâwk ka ti che.

Vawisûn hin i ran ruol chu va en suok vawng ka ta, berâm laia a dumin a rawl le, a dum pheu pheu le, a dum taphawt le, kêl laia a vârin a rawl le, a vârin a rawl pheu pheu chu, chutaka inthawkin ṭhuoi tum ka ta; chun, tuta hnung chu chuong anga um chu ka hlaw ni sienla.

Chuongchun, nakie ka hlaw dinghai en dinga i hung pha chun ka felna hin mi dawnpêk el a tih: kêl lai chun a vârin a rawl naw le, a vârin a rawl pheu pheu naw le, berâm laia a dum naw ka kuoma um i hmu taphawt chu ka inrûkah ruot el i tih,” a tih a.
Laban chun, “A ṭha ie! i hril ang tak chun ni raw se,” a tih a.

Chuongchun, chu ni tak chun kêlchal a vâra inzetan le, a vâra rawl pheu pheu po po le, kêlpui a vârin a rawl le, a vârin a rawl pheu pheu po po, a vâr ṭhang taphawt chu be- râm laia a dum po po le chun a ṭhuoi tum a, a naupasalhai kutah a pêk a.
Chun, ama le Jakob inkâra ni thum lama chun ân umtir a; chun, Jakob chun Laban ran ruol dang po po chu ân thla nâwk tah a.
Chun, Jakobin hriengzau le almond thing le insething hmawl hring a lâk a, a hâwng a khawk vâr a, hmawlhaia chun a vâr chu a suklang a.
A hmawl khawkna hâwnghai chu ran idâwn hlakna tui dâwnna thlênga dâm le, tui luongnaahai chun ran ruol hma peia chun a sieh a: chun, tui dâwn dinga an hung chun an hung inrai phut a.
Ran ruolhai chu hmawlhai zâwna chun an inrai phut a, a ze intan dâm, a ze chip nuk dâm, ân ze pheu pheu dâmin te an hung nei hlak a.

Jakob chun berâmtehai chu a sie tum a; ran ruolhai chu Laban ran ruolhai lai a ze intan le a dum po po tieng chu ân nghattir a; ama ran ruolhai chu a sie tum hlak a, Laban ran ruol lai chu a sie nawh a.
Ran hrât deuhai chu an hung inrai hlima, hmawl lai chun an inrai theina dingin, Jakob chun tui luongnaah, ran ruol mithmua chun hmawlhai chu a sie hlak a.
Amiruokchu, ran chu an ṭan a ṭha naw chun a sie ngai nawh: chuongchun, a te ṭanṭha naw deu- hai chu Laban ta a hung ni pei a, a hrât deuhai chu Jakob ta a hung ni pei a.
Chuongchun, Jakob chu nasa- takin a hung pung a, ran ruol, ruol lientak dâm, suoknu le suokpa dâm, sanghâwngsei dâm, sabengtung dâm a hung nei tah a.
